tool.name: SAGA.imagery_vigra.9
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayFEATURES True isArrayTRAINING False isArrayFIELD False isArrayRF_IMPORT False isArrayRF_EXPORT False output_data_CLASSES $output_data_CLASSES output_data_PROBABILITY $output_data_PROBABILITY output_data_PROBABILITIES $output_data_PROBABILITIES output_data_IMPORTANCES $output_data_IMPORTANCES name SAGA.imagery_vigra.9 FEATURES $FEATURES BPROBABILITIES $BPROBABILITIES TRAINING $TRAINING FIELD $FIELD LABEL_AS_ID $LABEL_AS_ID DO_MRMR $DO_MRMR mRMR_NFEATURES $mRMR_NFEATURES mRMR_DISCRETIZE $mRMR_DISCRETIZE mRMR_THRESHOLD $mRMR_THRESHOLD mRMR_METHOD $mRMR_METHOD RF_IMPORT $RF_IMPORT RF_EXPORT $RF_EXPORT RF_TREE_COUNT $RF_TREE_COUNT RF_TREE_SAMPLES $RF_TREE_SAMPLES RF_REPLACE $RF_REPLACE RF_SPLIT_MIN_SIZE $RF_SPLIT_MIN_SIZE RF_NODE_FEATURES $RF_NODE_FEATURES RF_STRATIFICATION $RF_STRATIFICATION prefer $prefer response $response outputType_CLASSES $OutputSection_CLASSES.outputType_CLASSES transmissionMode_CLASSES $OutputSection_CLASSES.transmissionMode_CLASSES outputType_PROBABILITY $OutputSection_PROBABILITY.outputType_PROBABILITY transmissionMode_PROBABILITY $OutputSection_PROBABILITY.transmissionMode_PROBABILITY outputType_PROBABILITIES $OutputSection_PROBABILITIES.outputType_PROBABILITIES transmissionMode_PROBABILITIES $OutputSection_PROBABILITIES.transmissionMode_PROBABILITIES outputType_IMPORTANCES $OutputSection_IMPORTANCES.outputType_IMPORTANCES transmissionMode_IMPORTANCES $OutputSection_IMPORTANCES.transmissionMode_IMPORTANCES

param.name: FEATURES
param.label: Features
param.help: Features The following data types are allowed in the txt file: x-ogc-envi, tiff, png, x-ogc-aaigrid

param.name: TRAINING
param.label: Training Areas
param.help: Training Areas The following data types are allowed in the txt file: json, vnd.google-earth.kml+xml, xml

param.name: FIELD
param.label: Label Field
param.help: Label Field The following data types are allowed in the txt file: csv

param.name: LABEL_AS_ID
param.label: Use Label as Identifier
param.help: Use training area labels as identifier in classification result, assumes all label values are integer numbers!

param.name: DO_MRMR
param.label: Minimum Redundancy Feature Selection
param.help: Use only features selected by the minimum Redundancy Maximum Relevance (mRMR) algorithm

param.name: mRMR_DISCRETIZE
param.label: Discretization
param.help: uncheck this means no discretizaton (i.e. data is already integer)

param.name: mRMR_THRESHOLD
param.label: Discretization Threshold
param.help: a double number of the discretization threshold; set to 0 to make binarization

param.name: RF_IMPORT
param.label: Import from File
param.help: Import from File The following data types are allowed in the txt file: plain

param.name: RF_EXPORT
param.label: Export to File
param.help: Export to File The following data types are allowed in the txt file: plain

param.name: RF_TREE_SAMPLES
param.label: Samples per Tree
param.help: Specifies the fraction of the total number of samples used per tree for learning.

param.name: RF_REPLACE
param.label: Sample with Replacement
param.help: Sample from training population with or without replacement?

param.name: RF_SPLIT_MIN_SIZE
param.label: Minimum Node Split Size
param.help: Number of examples required for a node to be split. Choose 1 for complete growing.

param.name: RF_STRATIFICATION
param.label: Stratification
param.help: Specifies stratification strategy. Either none, equal amount of class samples, or proportional to fraction of class samples.

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_CLASSES
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_CLASSES
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...

section.name: OutputSection_PROBABILITY
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_PROBABILITY
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...

section.name: OutputSection_PROBABILITIES
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_PROBABILITIES
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...

section.name: OutputSection_IMPORTANCES
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_IMPORTANCES
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...
